title: temporary 500 response for propfind with multiple users
body:
the mirall client reported an unknown error. the server logs showed me that the server answered a propfind request with error code 500.
below the obscurred lines from the error log.
the 500 line is underlined. 2 minutes earlier and 5 minutes later the same propfind was answered with 207 by the server (not in the log).

note: the line without username is no typo but copied directly from the server log.

    ip1 - luke [25/mar/2013:08:04:38 +0100] "propfind /p/remote.php/webdav/shared/fotos/2012/10%20oktober/g/gute%20bilder http/1.1" 207 2271 "-" "csyncoc/0.70.4 neon/0.29.6"
    ip1 - luke [25/mar/2013:08:04:42 +0100] "propfind /p/remote.php/webdav/shared/fotos/2012/08%20september http/1.1" 207 1115 "-" "csyncoc/0.70.4 neon/0.29.6"
    ip2 - user2 [25/mar/2013:08:04:32 +0100] "put /p/remote.php/webdav/fotos/2012/06%20juni/s/dsc04306.jpg http/1.1" 201 518 "-" "csyncoc/0.70.4 neon/0.29.6"
    ip2 - user2 [25/mar/2013:08:04:52 +0100] "proppatch /p/remote.php/webdav/fotos/2012/06%20juni/s/dsc04306.jpg http/1.1" 207 779 "-" "csyncoc/0.70.4 neon/0.29.6"
